website_summaries.verdict: Ball bungees have a variety of useful applications including wrapping cords and securing tarps.
pros: Useful in a lot of applications
Size is good for securing small items
Can loop together for a longer cord
Set available online is less expensive and good quality
cons: None of these are very long individually and may lose their stretch if left outside for a long time

customer_reviews.title: Handy item to carry in your bag (to carry your bag)
customer_reviews.text: I take the ferry home and love to stand outside and watch the view. However, the floor is often wet and salty, which is not great of I want to put by bag down for the 30 minnute. Now I use one of these to just hang my bag pretty much anywhere. What's more, I have 24 more of them to give to coworkers and friends!
customer_reviews.author: C. SPANOGHE

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to use in the classroom to place ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in the classroom to place on students' chairs. Those who need to move can bounce their legs on the cords. I'm excited to have found this product for this use. A cord made specifically for this purpose sells for $15 or more for one. I'm able to place one on 25 chairs for less than $10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for +1 season of use.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time purchase. Used on the trailer sailboat to keep lines and shrouds neatly around the mast when trailering the boat. Couple of the original set ordered are a bit stretched out. My fault. Stretching to max around the base of the mast where the jib and mainsheet halyards are wrapped. 12” would have been a better length to use. The others that just wrap the shrouds are fine. Seem to stand up well to a season of exposure to the elements. Inexpensive, makes life easier, functional and durable.
customer_reviews.author: da ah '00

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around tool
customer_reviews.text: Ball bungees are an elegant, inexpensive, and easy-to-use tool for wrapping cords, ratchet straps, and other ungainly materials in your house and garage. They also give you a loop anywhere you have a hole, which makes them perfect for tying up tarps. The Kotap ball bungees are strong and flexible. I use them for organizing electric cords and ratchet straps in my garage. They're much less expensive than velcro or wire wraps. When in doubt, order longer bungee straps. The 6-inch straps will work fine for securing tarps or boards, but it's hard to wrap them around cords or cables.
customer_reviews.author: GearHead

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - beware of cheaper brands - these hold up well
customer_reviews.text: I drew up plans to build a small 8X10 sun shade area to use my table saw and compound miter saw without the blazing hot sun cooking my melon. It was 122 degrees here last week and we haven't seen a day below 100 degrees in over a month. What started as an 8X10 somehow morphed into a 16X20 monstrosity. Had to order two more packs of these. I tried other brands that offer a 100 pack for less than $20 but they were poor quality and either the bungee snapped or had little stretch and just wouldn't work. These Kotap brands bungee balls are better quality and cheaper than the ones I got from that Harbor store.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: As good as any
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I've learned to like this type of bungee. When I first got some in a variety pack of bungee cords I thought just what the heck am I going to use these for? After a few years I found uses. I wrap extension cords, garden hoses, and camping gear with these. They stay coiled up nice and are easier to store. Even use them to secure items to the roll bar of a jeep, nothing heavy/hard. Just be sure to read the dimensions carefully so you order what you need.
customer_reviews.author: TJJ

customer_reviews.title: Atv tool rack replacement straps / baby proofers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and much longer lasting than name brand rubber ones. Currently securely retaining a shovel. Also used for securing tarp to bottom of tent and tent to stakes. They're awesome. They're super useful for baby proofing your house. Buy a bag of them you'll find 200 uses before you know it too!
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: These ARE PERFECT working with a tarp
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in the 9 inch for putting up a large 15 x 15 tarp over our gazebo that has aged from the sun. These ARE PERFECT working with a tarp. So handy and easy to use. Actually attractive in a way too. They secured the grommets to the underside metal frame of the gazebo with ease. I would highly recommend them for this use and plan on buying more just to have around the house for securing up wires under my desk and many other purposes I can think of for them. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality.
customer_reviews.text: We have used these in the past and they have proved to be excellent. Used to hold a canopy top to a modular frame, they withstand wind, rain, snow, and year around weather conditions. After 2 years, some of the ball bungees need replacing due to the weather. Loss of elasticity is the primary reason for the need to replace. It takes only a few moments to remove the older bungees and slip in the new, and we are set for another couple of years. We could not do without these.
customer_reviews.author: Old Sparkie

customer_reviews.title: Great problem solver for my wood pile
customer_reviews.text: Recently began getting my wood pile game on point. Never really covered it up that much and kind of let the weather do what it wanted. Began using these to attach tarps to the fence it's near and draping them over the piles. Work perfectly. Hooks up easily, nothings fallen off or pulled loose. Their sturdy and easy to hook up. No complaints at all and their cheap. If one does end up only lasting a year or two maybe from sun or wear, their easy and cheap to replace
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Very usefull for many things
customer_reviews.text: They work great. They are shorter than expected. I think the 6 inch measurement is the length including the ball. If you are using these to wrap around something the size of a paper towel tube then these are good. Anything larger and you should get the next size longer.
customer_reviews.author: porcupine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my need
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gaffer use. I bundle cables, attach batteries to light stands. Attach things to my tripod legs, and use them for many similar purposes. I try to keep many different sizes, so the right length is available when needed. They stretch quite well, but do have their limit. Then the next larger size is the perfect choice. I use a pair of them to attach my monopod to my camera bag straps, so it's always with the camera when I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: The price is awesome to keep a bag on hand for any projects ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several packages of these, in 6 inch, 9 inch, 12 inch. I've used them on bikes, soccer goals, sports equipment, bundles of wood, trees to their supporting poles, lawn furniture, moving items in a truck, camping. I have friends who see them and "borrow". The price is awesome to keep a bag on hand for any projects or unexpected uses. They last fairly well in the weather, but they will start to break down after spending some time out in the sun. I've replaced some that have broken down but it's expected with bungee cord.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brabetz

customer_reviews.title: The long size makes application easy and they last longer than shorter ones that have to be tighter.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these long bungees. I use them to hold a tarp on a carport frame and the longer size allows the tarp to stand up to flexing in the wind without stretching the bungees to the point of breaking. These last A LOT longer than any others I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Jack HTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Look & Feel
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to utilize these for their intended use, but I did test each individual bungee for strength and integrity. They have a high quality look and feel out of the bag. I plan to use these to secure an outdoor projector screen to a frame, so I will update this review once I've put them to work.
customer_reviews.author: M R Bigler

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a shorter bungee but it wasn't available. I ordered the 11 inch and, indeed, I could shorten it. I just used an ice pick to pick out one end of the bungee from inside the ball, pulled it out until the loop on the other end was the size I wanted and then tied a knot in the part I pulled out. I suppose a handier person could put a clamp on the extended end and then cut off the excess, but I'm leaving the extra length in place so I can always adjust for longer if I want to. Nice product. Delivered timely and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: CanyonCat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These work fine! I used them to hold up a 20 X 16 very strong mesh tarp...they are holding up very well. I’m just not sure how they will with stand the elements (90 Miles west) of Houston, Texas... However, being they are doing what I needed them for, I’m ordering another big mesh tarp and 2 more bungee packs. I will update in a year or sooner if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 2yr old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect alternative to child refrigerator locks. Since we’ve been quarantined, bummy 2yr old has learned to open doors...specifically the freezer. We tied two of these cords together to secure the fridge and freezer doors. Now, the doors open maybe 4-5” but baby girl can’t get her hand inside while pulling the door open (...yet). Right now, she can pull on the door handles as hard as she wants, but the doors always snap shut The days of arguing over a “p.pop” (popsicle) at 7am are over!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well For Shade Cloth Installation
customer_reviews.text: Used these to attach a grommeted shade cloth to 2x6 rafters over our patio. The ball bungees work well and the 11 inch size was long enough to stretch around the 2x6's. They have been installed for two weeks and have held the cloth in place through a couple of thunder storms with strong winds. We will see how they hold up over time, but so far we are impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Windy City Family

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but the first high winds you have they will stretch out ridiculously have have to be replaced. Just use some paracord instead.
customer_reviews.author: bluegirl

customer_reviews.title: These have nice elastic in them
customer_reviews.text: These have nice elastic in them. i was a bit skeptical when i ordered because of low price. these aren't the cheap ones with thin elastic band in them. i have respect for bungee cord when i was a fat kid my dad had a roll in the garage i grabbed it climbed the tree tied it off and pretended to be Tarzan. well you get the picture fat kid jumping out of a tree swinging on bungee cord didn't end well for me or the rope
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Boring But Functional
customer_reviews.text: They're durable. The rubber band stays flexible and can stretch a long way. They are basic black and don't offer a lot of visual eye-candy. They do what they're supposed to. They're nicely built and won't break the bank. I suspect they won't get you any more date-nights than you'd get without them, but they'll hold the stuff you're trying to hold together pretty well. I guess in certain situations they might get you extra dates, like if your date includes camping, or tying stuff together.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: High quality ball bungees.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hold down three 16 mil thick poly tarps that I bought for a fried. She has no complaints. I think that speaks volumes for the high quality of the Bungees. I would gladly buy more from this same seller if I needed more. And I think you can trust the seller too.
customer_reviews.author: OmniNegro

customer_reviews.title: Very good stretching length and tension
customer_reviews.text: I bought these from time to time to replace the old ones so I know I like this better than the rests. While I can't comment on the durability these bungee are very stretching and have very good tension. It's not just the rubber itself but the sleeve that allows the rubber to stretch far. I also bought another one, shorter in length, just to make sure don't get stuck with low quality bungees from the same vendor. This one is much better as I said before. The other one doesn't stretch far enough as the sleeve construction that doesn't allow and there is little pulling tension.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Heavier cord than others
customer_reviews.text: The bungee cord on these 9 in. Ball Bungees is sturdier than other bungee cord keeper balls that I have purchased. I use them to secure a sunscreen across the opening of a boat dock. They are exposed to sun and weather throughout the year. Have had them in use for only 2 months but so far so good. I am expecting them to last longer than what was replaced which lasted about 4 to 6 months. Update: After 6 months of exposure to weather, I see no signs of wear on these heavy duty bungees. Holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: High Quality compared to some others.  Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the 45-Minutes I spent trying to decide which bungee thing to purchase. Don't over-think this, people. These are good quality bungee-ball-thingies with nice elastic that have held up very well with daily exposure to the Arizona sun. Buy ones longer than you think you'll need, untie a few and cut to the size you need. Instant assortment pack. I'll probably buy another pack soon since I have found all sorts of ways to use these that I never imagined. Note: Not for use on cats, but I'll eventually be forgiven.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Franz

customer_reviews.title: Worth a little extra cost if you want them stronger
customer_reviews.text: I bought the slightly cheaper versions of this for too long so thought I'd try these based on reviews. The strength it takes to stretch these is at least twice that of the cheaper version. I used these (as well as some 9" ones) to put a new tarp on my carport/shelter. Perfect amount of "pull" if you get the right size. My shelter top is drum tight and it never was with the others.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Good light-duty bungee
customer_reviews.text: I consider these to be light duty. The one's I bought at a local store use thicker bungee and support more weight. With that said, for the price these are a great option for light requirements. I use these to secure a blanket to the roll bar of my Jeep and bundle objects in the garage to better organize storage. They keep hoses rolled up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: TJJ

customer_reviews.title: Tons of uses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these specifically to secure a pet barrier inside our 2012 Subaru Outback. I used seven of these 9" bungees to secure this barrier.  I have a bunch of bungees left over, so I'll be finding other uses for them going forward. They are very strong bungees and the balls seem to be very securely attached. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Ø™Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: The new duct tape!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first ball bungies. Love them. As a bungie cord fan, how did the ball bungie format escape my notice? No matter. Now I know and I like! These are short BTW. That is not a complaint, just an observation. Just don't expect to use them for a big job. Unless maybe if you string all of them together.
customer_reviews.author: Biggins

customer_reviews.title: Did not ship 25
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a canopy tent I have that takes 24 bungee balls to hold the canvas on. I only had 22 balls in the package. Now I need to return them and hope the next package has 25. Made and packed in China or USA, someone needs to re-calibrate their scale or learn to count.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a bundle of 25 short bungies with a ball anchoring the two ends together in a loop. The bungies are great for a quick way to keep extension cords together, cables behind your computer in a home office, as well as anchoring tarps and similar jobs. They are easy to use and seem well made. I wouldn't hesitate to buy more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Polk

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't tried ball bungees your in for a treat! These are easy to use over and over again. Works great for hanging a tarp for camping because of that little bit of give they seem to hold better. I have used these in many applications for gardening to putting up christmas lights.
customer_reviews.author: newhope

customer_reviews.title: These work great. I needed 20 to repair my kid's trampoline
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I needed 20 to repair my kid's trampoline. I used 5 each on the front and two sides, sending them through twice and then doubled on the rear 5 spots. Increased capacity and firm hold. Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, works for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hang projector screen to the frame. These do not stretch too much, which is what I needed so that it can hold the screen in place. But they are strong and with the striped design and large ball, it looks good too. Highly recommend this for anyone who needs to use it as a tie to join together anything around 2-3 inches side. This can go around it and secure it tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Amit M

customer_reviews.title: These are great for securing things in your canoe or kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for securing odd and ends inside my canoe. They are easy to use, durable and strong enough to secure paddles to the boat as well as anything else you might need to keep in place. I have about 8 of them on the boat at all times. There are more than enough in the bag and I was happy to share with my friends to use on their boats. If you are looking for something like this, I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding down a tarp on a boat
customer_reviews.text: You can use these things in a million ways. My boat trailer is made of round steel tube, so I wrap these around the tube and a bit of line tied to the tarp. The bungee cord keeps the tarp held down tight and allows for slight variances each time I put the tarp back on. On some areas, I just push the bungee cord through the grommet holes to tie the tarp together.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great bungee cords for use around around garage and boat
customer_reviews.text: Great bungee cords for use around around garage and boat. Garage - secure extension cords and rope, hold item up and out of the way Boat - secure items to rails, hold down top, hang things off top, secure dock lines and fenders Well made and long lasting first bunch bought have lasted well over a year so far.
customer_reviews.author: DSM1902

customer_reviews.title: They're useful in all sorts of unexpected situations
customer_reviews.text: I almost certainly did not need a whole bag of these, but that's on me. They're useful in all sorts of unexpected situations, and it's easy to toss a spare one in a bag or in the car for surprise situations. Material's great, and they're easy enough to use that you start looking for excuses. :)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: These are strong, well-made and easy to use. The large ball makes them connect easily even when very stretched-out. I used them to attach a canvas tarp, by it's grommets, to the top surface of a pergola. Voila! Instant sun/rain protection!
customer_reviews.author: J. GrayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best child-proofing device
customer_reviews.text: We got the idea from another post to wrap this around cabinet doors instead of buying those plastic ones that break easily or kids learn to open. I have to say, despite vigorous and regular attempts to open cabinets it is very safe and costs only a fraction of the professional childproofing brands. Elastic is strong and will stay so for many months.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Best bungee so many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Omg I didn’t realize how much I would love these things very easy to use in so many ways. Fast and durable amazing how many quick easy uses you will find for these things. I use them to fasten down my racks my tools to hold objects on poles anything hoses cords I will be ordering more of them. Best bungees ever.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Wow, who knew I needed these!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of Ball Bungees until I had happened to see them posted. I ordered based upon the reviews, and they arrived quickly. Right out of the bag, I grabbed a few and used them for something that I was vicing while gluing. Wow, they are great. How did I ever live without them?
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice little replacement bungie cords for our soccer net.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. These are exactly what I was looking for. The original bungie hook ones that came with the net break pretty easy when your fourteen year old is rocketing shots off of it. These took the beating and were not affected in any way. I'll edit my post if they don't last but they are perfect for what I needed on this soccer net so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Not only for tarps!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product...I do not use them for tarp tie downs. I use them the secure rolled-up garden hoses, electrical drop cords, 50 foot air lines, and anything else that is rolled or coiled up...beats using hook-and-loop...appears to ge real good quality...just order 25 more of each size!! (garden hoses need the 11 inch size usually.
customer_reviews.author: Greatescape

customer_reviews.title: A Quick Up Cover Method -
customer_reviews.text: It's summertime, the temporary cover is up over my deck and it's got a new lot of ball bungees holding it. Installation is relatively quick with this method, different sizes for different situations and covers, so go with the "speed balls".
customer_reviews.author: Jim in California

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product and Price Point!
customer_reviews.text: Needed more than 6" and no option other than this item at 9". Elastic loop can not be adjusted through the ball and to reduce overall length - double or triple wrap. Being used to secure tarp on outside items. Expect to get a few years out of ball bungee being exposed to the outside environment.
customer_reviews.author: chw

customer_reviews.title: Good prices for the bunch of them.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a variety of things like chord ties and attaching tarps/awnings to a frame. The grand kids like to wear on their arms and use for counting, supervised of course, because I don't want to loose any. I have only put these to use outside for a couple of months, so I don't know how long they will hold up. Based on other bungie chords I've used, I expect them to last 1-2 years. Good prices for the bunch of them.
customer_reviews.author: MaryP

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I got these.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t remember why I bought these. I think they came free with something else I purchased. Anyway, these are a great quality bungee device. It is one continuous loop with a hard plastic ball at one end of the loop. I’ll share as soon as I figure out what to do with them. If you know, please reply to this post. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: NurseTurbo

customer_reviews.title: Great for wrapping music cords!
customer_reviews.text: I run a concert series and have about 20 microphone and guitar cables that I have to wrap each week. These ball bungees work great for holding rolled up cables together. Just the right amount of stretch to hold the cables tight. This is my 3rd order and the ones Ibought 2 years ago are still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brittain

customer_reviews.title: useful bungee ties
customer_reviews.text: These bungee loops with a sliding ball lock have been useful, sturdy and are easily expandable. So far I've used them to secure a rolled up carpet and linked a couple to secure a tarp cover. It would probably be useful to get some smaller ones as well. Very handy and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: audrey frances

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to attach my tarp to the top of my ramada/pergola. They work great but do not last. They fray very quickly and pop off. I've already had to replace the majority of them. I suggest if you need them for anything outdoors in the hot summer heat, you purchase something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: sully

customer_reviews.title: Over 2 years and still work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these over 2 years ago and am still using them. I mostly use mine in the garage keeping power cords and extension cords organized. The ones on the saws are always under tension and in use (unless I'm using the equipment) and they have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: creed

customer_reviews.title: Thinner bungee than I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I have some that are a lot thicker and stronger than these that came in the mail today (they were shipped very fast) but these are quite a bit cheaper so I will keep them but will keep looking for the thicker ones. I can buy the thicker ones local but they are not branded either so I don't know where I will find them. If anyone knows please comment. These are NOT 5mm, they are 4.5mm The ones I like are 5.3mm
customer_reviews.author: Hap

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little All-Purpose Bungee
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to close up half-full dog food bags, secure things to fence posts and everything in between. We keep some in the cars and others in the garage and house. A very functional utility item. So, far (6 months) they've all held up well and been re-used. It just works.
customer_reviews.author: Cholet02

customer_reviews.title: Getter than the old hooked bungees
customer_reviews.text: Soo much better than the old bungees. I can't believe theses were only recently invented. These can be interlocked with others, even the old hooked bungees. Pros Variety of use Don't fling open when you take tension off Includes the ball, which makes wrapping easy
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: Reusable!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about handy! Amazing how many uses you'll find for these little guys... best part is they can be re-used!
customer_reviews.author: Rita R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I used them to replace old ones on a baseball rebounder. They work great, but I'm trying to decide if I should take them off and store them inside for the winter here in the northeast ... or at least not under tension. Cheap enough if I laze out of it.
customer_reviews.author: groovebilledani

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 sizes (9", 6" and 4") and use them regularly around the house, shop and for my audio/lighting business. If nothing else works, these always seem to get the job done. Whether tying up extension cords, hanging a bands banner from the rear stage truss or keeping the air filter cover on my equipment truck! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Joel G

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These would be wonderful if they had some sort of catch for the loop (e.g. if the ball was half a ball instead to catch the bungee). The product is great otherwise, but I've had the cord slip off the ball a couple times, once shooting like a slingshot after slipping free and hitting me just below my eye.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great bungee!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and were cheap compared to the bungees found at Home Depot or another big box store. I used these to hold banners fro my business and they have held up for several years now. It's hard to find this size in black, so I bought 2 packs. I can honestly say I've never broken one of these- and I pull them very tight! BUT- they will break your nail if you aren't careful! Amazon Prime meant fast and free delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: The quality was amazing in terms of their material and the elasticity while ...
customer_reviews.text: They were very durable. I used them to connect a projector screen to PVC pipe. The quality was amazing in terms of their material and the elasticity while maintaining a very tight grip. I am surprised how well the elastic band held the ball attached without coming loose. The original application of the band around the balls also was very easy. The elastic was not to hard to stretch and the balls did not come loose during this process. Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Liguori

customer_reviews.title: Fit a wide range of goals
customer_reviews.text: Our soccer team uses these to hang their goal nets on the frames at different fields/parks. The nine inch length works great for securing to both the rounded and squared frames. They need to be stretched out a bit, but that will occur with frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Mom

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt get past the smell
customer_reviews.text: These seemed great but boy did the stink. You could smell them before even opening the plastic it comes in. I ended up buying something different but I couldn't get past the bad smell. They did seem to be ok quality but never tried them so cant be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Average Mom

customer_reviews.title: Present and future consumer.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before from a different vendor. They were way under par and cost more. These are 10 times better. Dont stretch out. Look no further. You will be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: TAS70

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used these to secure a tarp,in the back seat of my truck where my 2 hounds ride. They are quite exuberant at times and so far these are working great with no,fear of metal hooks causing damage I will update later after the hounds have had more time to figure the cords out but, so far, am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: You'll find many uses for these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I had a need for 5 of them. But as time goes by, I continue to find uses for these. Long extension cords, stored garden hoses, lengths of rope, and several other items in my garage are kept neater and better organized using these bungees.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Adams

customer_reviews.title: So Useful
customer_reviews.text: If you never used an item like this, you have to try it if you own a Jeep, like to camp, own a canopy or almost anything outdoors. Its most useful when attaching a tent cloth to the poles. But it is so my more. I also use it to secure my bikini top to my Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving and wrapping weird stuff. Also anchor to moving truck
customer_reviews.text: These are so versatile and so sturdy. They're a new staple in my moving kit. Ratchets, rope, bungee cables, bungee balls, and large rubber bands. They make life so much easier and they save so much time. Just order them. You'll be so glad that you did.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Bungees
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a smaller pack online but this was the best deal I could find. These are useful for a bunch of things. I'm using mine in a more unconventional way, by using them to tie my Tripod to some straps my camera bag has on the front and they've been great for said application. The bungee cord seems durable and not prone to break or pop.
customer_reviews.author: David Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Needed longer ones for a project, these worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a upgrade to my 10x20 shelter. I reinforced the tubing skeleton of my shelter with 2x4's, needed longer tie downs to go around tube and 2x4, these worked great, not so worried about wind launching and bending up my shelter now.
customer_reviews.author: smithnwesson

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as advertised. They hold up well so far, just be aware they do not stretch as far as lighter weight ball bungees I've used from the generic store. But they are stronger than those lighter weight bungee. So, trade offs, but worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous tool!
customer_reviews.text: These have tons of uses. I’ve used them on my car’s roof rack to transport lots of things as well as to tidy big hoses and electrical cables. Great for holding large disassembled parrot cage parts together as well. Just use your imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: these are not as good as ones that I've purchased from another seller
customer_reviews.text: the elastic on these are about half the diameter as ones that I've purchased in the past. I bought these type because I thought these were better than the ones that are all black. these are about the same quality as the ones that are all black.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Use this if you want to tie someting down
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for securing the cover for our outdoor table. Used it especially in the winter and it held the cover down even in the snow, rain and very strong wind. Chaining the bungies together provided a very flexible method for tying everything down.
customer_reviews.author: wolfb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I needed some short bungees like these to hold tarp and shade cloth to frames (Burning Man, Coachella, summer camping in general). They’ve done the job and withheld a wide range of weathering without breaking. Perfect buy.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: These Kotap Ball Bungee cords are amazingly versatile and well made. You can stretch them without worry of deterioration and breaking. They are made of high quality material and will not disappoint you.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lacrosse Pitchback and Goal
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly as replacement ties on my son's lacrosse pitchback. We also used the extras to secure the netting on his goal. I gave 4 stars for Durability since they have shown a bit of deterioration in the few months they have been outside. None of the bungees have failed yet, though.
customer_reviews.author: Todd[home]

customer_reviews.title: good for going around smaller/thinner things
customer_reviews.text: not much flex/give for the shorter lengths, i wish i had gotten the 8 inch ones. i recommend trying a smaller amount of the desired size to "test fit" before buying in such massive quantities. but if you already know for a fact that 6" ones are the ones for you, then these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Fit 1.25" steel case tube very well.
customer_reviews.text: The balls are bigger than expected. But they do look fine when installed. Now kids can use the following soccer goal again. 10 more balls (i.e. total 35 balls) are better for a 12x6ft goal. Hopefully they will last. Will come back to update.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value! I quit buying the shorter one as these are really easy to adjust by just tying a knot. I used these on everything from hoses to extension cords. They work great and are a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Beantown

customer_reviews.title: Can’t have enough, definitely buying 25 more. Extremely handy!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these to keep my 150” projector screen in the center of my 2 car garage door. It was too big for the single garage door. But to get a mental picture of the screen size at 150” it goes from the top of the opening to the floor, and only 3 feet on each side of the screen to garage door track. My 3rd car garage door was simply too small to put it in that opening.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Spallina

customer_reviews.title: These are the one to buy !
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money on another brand , i did that for you. I wanted the black ones from another Amazon vendor. They in no way compare at all to these by kotap, these 'by far' are the most resilient and strongest holding longest lasting of the bungee cords that I've tried. I have a 100 pack of the solid black and they're going to the trash . 1/2 the stretch and not even1/2 the holding strength, no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: KET19

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: A great value for how many you get. I messed up and got ones that are too short, but two of them together did the job just fine! They appear strong and capable of doing what I need them to do. My only complaint is that the materials stink!!! I'm using them outside though, so that won't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Buy These!  Don't settle for poorly made anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other sizes of the Kotap brand bungees. These bungees are strong and don't loose their elasticity readily. I just bought these 11 inch for a specific project and expect they are as good as the other Kotap. I have only left a few out in the weather for 8 months on tarps and they are still strong and not frayed, and they still hold strong.
customer_reviews.author: outdoorsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on soccer net
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to secure a soccer goal net to the frame since the Velcro strips that came with the goal wore out quickly. These worked great. They hold up well to the forces the net has to meet, and also seem to be somewhat resistant to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Durable, and stretchable to add a knot.
customer_reviews.text: 6 inch useful for tie up of loose items. Stretching ability allows adding a knot to hold in place. Thick cord, durable. Better than my old HD bungee. Ha! Please say helpful if you like.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soccer goals
customer_reviews.text: Used these to secure a net to a soccer goal. They just barely were able to make the full loop around the crossbar, but that's better than loose anyhow. And they look way better than zip ties or tape.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: These did exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Used to strap down a tarp over a swing. Tarp was heavy canvass. These held it tight and stretched it out perfectly. I have had them on for over 6 months and still are going strond, even out doors in our Houston Texas weather.
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to install/secure a wind/privacy screen on my deck. Just the right size. Holds material in place very well. Great price compared to prior purchases from local retailers. Actually could no longer find the product locally but found various sizes online.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R. Rubisch

customer_reviews.title: Well made and perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Really are well made, hold down the tarp without losing the stretch. I use them to tarp my 12' X 20' Car Cover. Just bought these a second time to connect a new tarp , as a result of high winds form Hurricane Delta. They were still holding the tarp that had split down the middle. But were overstretched.
customer_reviews.author: tomnchrist

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described.
customer_reviews.text: My local home depot stopped carrying the orange ones. Now I'm glad they did. This is a nice sturdy set of ball bungees, feels even stronger than the others I used to get. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 6 inch kotap ball bungees - So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Sufficent stretch and easy to use. First use was to replace missing net bands from our pitchback. Worked just fine. Next will be using the to hang our LCD projector 10' screen from the quick pvc frame we made for it. Curious to see how long the stay elastic and how they hold up outdoors in new England weather over 3/4 of the year. Update in the future as I know better.
customer_reviews.author: Minions Web

customer_reviews.title: Great used
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic idea! Worked perfectly on tarps grommets. Used them to wrap a wooden base of hammock for winter with the tarps purchased here too, and it work better than expected. Better than normal bungy cords, but if you need hooks, bungy cords are what u need.
customer_reviews.author: Renny

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the tent cords at Walmart. I use these to wrap around E-clip straps, SO NEAT. -David 201
customer_reviews.author: David C Gavlick

customer_reviews.title: Easy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. They are easy to put on and take off and keep my projector screen in place when its needed. Good product. I ended up buying two packs of these so I have extras.
customer_reviews.author: GrimmRoper

customer_reviews.title: Seem heavy duty....
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hold solar screens in the place during the summer. These are thicker and after a year they appear to be lasting longer as well. This multi pack is an amazing deal compared to the OE replacements.
customer_reviews.author: H E McCartney III

customer_reviews.title: I basically use these everywhere...
customer_reviews.text: and when I run out I order more. Maybe my pics will give you some ideas. Some of these are exposed to direct sunlight all day and appear to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely versatile way to keep things organized.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for all kinds of things. Very handy to have in the truck, garage or the house. Forget about zip ties or the Velcro ones. I bought them to keep my tie down straps and extension cords organized. And of course they’re great being used for their intended purpose, securing a tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Works in many places
customer_reviews.text: I love these as I never knew they existed. We bought these to hold on a Pergola Canopy and the ease was unbelievable. They are sturdy, well made, nice looking and easy to use. Will buy more
customer_reviews.author: JS

product_meta.title: Kotap BB-6B 6-Inch Ball Bungee, Black, 25 Count (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:6-Inch (including ball)These ball bungees from Kotap are ideal for securing tarps to canopies or other fixed points. Prolongs the life of tarps and grommets by allowing slight movement. Versatile and ready to use for any securing or organizational project. Based in New York, Kotap America is a family owned business and is proud to be one of the nation's largest distributors of polyethylene tarp products.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Product Details: Kotap Heavy-Duty Ball Bungees are used to secure tarps to canopy frames or other fixed points. Also prolongs the life of tarps and gromets by allowing slight movement. Reusable.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty and verstile, these bungee cords have a multitude of uses: fasten tarps with grommets, organize and secure hoses, cords or wires,
Easy to use, install, remove or reposition, and are reusable
Prolongs the life of tarps and grommets by allowing movement
Bungee Length is 6-Inch (including ball), Cord Diameter is 1/5-Inch (5mm), Nylon Ball Diameter is 1-Inch
Bungee cords are black with grey accents
